Translations.Text: inna alladhina kafaru lan tugh'niya ʿanhum amwaluhum wala awladuhum mina l-lahi shayan wa-ulaika hum waqudu l-nari
kadabi ali fir'ʿawna wa-alladhina min qablihim kadhabu biayatina fa-akhadhahumu l-lahu bidhunubihim wal-lahu shadidu l-ʿiqabi
qul lilladhina kafaru satugh'labuna watuh'sharuna ila jahannama wabi'sa l-mihadu

qad kana lakum ayatun fi fi-atayni l-taqata fi-atun tuqatilu fi sabili l-lahi wa-ukh'ra kafiratun yarawnahum mith'layhim raya l-ʿayni wal-lahu yu-ayyidu binasrihi man yashau inna fi dhalika laʿib'ratan li-uli l-absari

zuyyina lilnnasi hubbu l-shahawati mina l-nisai wal-banina wal-qanatiri l-muqantarati mina l-dhahabi wal-fidati wal-khayli l-musawamati wal-anʿami wal-harthi dhalika mataʿu l-hayati l-dun'ya wal-lahu ʿindahu hus'nu l-maabi

qul a-unabbi-ukum bikhayrin min dhalikum lilladhina ittaqaw ʿinda rabbihim jannatun tajri min tahtiha l-anharu khalidina fiha wa-azwajun mutahharatun warid'wanun mina l-lahi wal-lahu basirun bil-ʿibadi
